snippet.title: The Konia Project - a cellphone games emulator for C64
snippet.description:
Hi folks,
here you are my short promo of the Konia project, a game for C64 where you can play 3 games "inside" a Nok... ehm, an old  "Konia" cellphone, while funny text messages entertain you.

Hitting spacebar in-game makes you warp in the "crazy mode", where a game switches to another game suddenly.

Hitting spacebar during the menu choice picks a random chat to show.

​Can you reach 255 points and break the "indestructible" phone?

Download it from https://back2the8bit.itch.io/the-konia-project
